metadata.title: CVE-2016-9888 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: An error within the "tar_directory_for_file()" function (gsf-infile-tar.c) in GNOME Structured File Library before 1.14.41 can be exploited to trigger a Null pointer dereference and subsequently cause a crash via a crafted TAR file.

criterions.comment: libgsf package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.41-1').
